name: FreeFuninAustin-FlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done. Any time you're ready for more -- and there's new content on Free Fun in Austin every single day -- just say "Alexa, start free fun" and our words will fill your ears. That's all there is to it!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
